name: app_news
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool steam.
Tool description: Search, and get app/reviews/news data from store.steampowered.com
API description: Fetch the latest news for a specific app from the Steam API.

limit.description: The number of news articles to retrieve.

appid.description: The Steam app ID for which to fetch the news.

contentlength.description: The maximum length of the news content. Defaults to 300.
